# Right Triangle Similarity 
Theorems 

## Right Triangle Similarity 
Theorems

Two triangles are similar if their corresponding angles are congruent. In effect, the corresponding sides of similar triangles are proportional. So far, you have learned three triangle similarity theorems: AA similarity postulate, SSS and SAS similarity theorems.
